RAM_ADDR_BITSTREAM=0x12000000
RAM_ADDR_KERNEL=0x11000000
RAM_ADDR_DEVICETREE=0x10000000
RAM_ADDR_BOOT-SCRIPT=0x10800000

loadaddr=0x01000000
kernel_addr_r=0x01000000
fdt_addr_r=0x02000000
ramdisk_addr_r=0x02300000
bootm_size=0x0a000000

bootargs=earlycon console=ttyS0,115200 earlyprintk rw root=/dev/mmcblk0p2
bootcmd=run sdboot
sdboot=fatload mmc 0:1 ${RAM_ADDR_BOOT-SCRIPT} boot.scr; source ${RAM_ADDR_BOOT-SCRIPT}
